node.name: CTG - System Performance - TimeFrame Compare Reports - (SRM 4.x)

property.description: • Report created or modified by *SS*.

This report provides a heatmap of VMAX FA port utilization. It is s multi-level report and can be drilled into to see details.
NOTE - BLANK/WHITE cells are due to that VMAX not having those corresponding FE Directors installed.
Color of the rectangle - FA Utilization % (matching the heatmap legend)
Click on each FA to drill into see an individual port heat map.

This report provides a heatmap of VMAX FA port utilization. It is s multi-level report and can be drilled into to see details.
Color of the rectangle --> Port Utilization %
Click on each FA port to drill into each port for detailed specifics.
